Wonderware Benelux Partners with Imsa Belgium to Fill New Business Development Management Position in the Industrial Automation Business : IMSA International Executive Search
IMSA International Executive Search is a global network of partner owned, Executive Search & Selection Companies.   Follow IMSA at https://www.linkedin.com/company/imsa-international-executive-search

Duffy Group, Inc. is a recruitment firm that works with corporations to help them find the right talent.  ‘The best (candidates) can’t be hired, they must be courted.’  As a virtual extension of our client’s team, we focus on delivering value in every aspect of the process.  Talent gaps, especially at the professional level, restrict an organization’s productivity and bottom-line on a daily basis. We understand the importance of quality candidates and an effective process that provides a solid return-on-investment.

Coordinate all research activities for this major retained search-consulting firm.  Responsible for developing strategy of the search, sourcing of acceptable candidates; qualifying of candidates; preparation of status reports including documentation of sources, competitive salary, and qualification information; developed background research and information; detailed reference checks and interface between client and candidate.Search assignments predominately in technology-based industries:  computer systems, semiconductor, software and aerospace.  Very strong skills in varied approaches to sourcing.

Her organization's cost effective, results oriented research approach led to high quality hires for a variety of positions.  The Duffy Group possess the unique ability to work effectively from frontline, to highly technical and senior level executive positions.  Kathleen and her team function as extensions of the organizations they represent and do so with a level of integrity, passion and advocacy not common in the field.

Kathleen has served as both a wonderful friend and an inspiring mentor to me over the past 10+ years.  Her business sense is extremely sharp and she is a bravely pioneering leader of people.  She creates innovative solutions for client and community needs and her uncanny ability to match talent to need is an incredible resource.  Upon the inception of my organization, All About Girls, Inc., she was a much-appreciated cheerleader and a critical resource for her in depth knowledge of the business and non-profit community.  My professional formation has been strongly influenced by Kathleen and my hope is to build an organization that is as well focused, mission-minded and firmly rooted as Duffy Research has become.

I have had the pleasure of knowing and consulting with Kathleen in problem resolution in an internal business challenge we were having in our call center.  Not only did Kathleen respond to our needs quickly, but she responded personally with her team to ensure she understood our challenge and that we were satisfied with the proposed resolution.  Anytime I have ever called upon Kathleen, she has been very responsive, professional and she listens to your issues.  Kathleen is very well respected in our business community; she has this reputation because she will go out of her way to ensure an excellent outcome to any challenges that a company may have.

Thanks Shannon...who knows maybe I will be tweeting in the near future!

Endorsed by Mary Catellier, SHRM-SCP, SPHR and 2 other mutual connections
summary: Given the recruiting industry has many players, the market is filled with a lot of noise and conflicting information, especially around recruiting fees and success statistics.  Employers seem to think they are limited to a recruiting model based on a candidate’s compensation. In the new economy, employers were asking for a recruiting solution that was more efficient and cost effective...so we changed our model and it's not based on a candidate's compensation!  As a result, we are saving our clients over 50% in traditional search fees.When we say “Recruitment Redefined” they are not just words, they are reality for our clients. With Practice Leaders well versed in their industries and respected in their fields, our core industries include Aerospace, Alternative & Renewable Energy, Financial Services, Food Manufacturing, Healthcare, Human Resources, Industrial Manufacturing, Lean/Six Sigma, and Oil & Gas. While we are headquartered in Phoenix, we have a National presence and in the last few years have expanded globally working in Europe, Asia, and Brazil.Specialties: Aerospace, Alternative & Renewable Energy, Financial Services, Food Manufacturing, Healthcare, Human Resources, Industrial Manufacturing, Lean/Six Sigma, and Oil & Gas
